rooms.name: Traditional Double Room, 2 Double Beds
description:
2 double beds
Overlooking the city

Relax - In-room massage available
Entertainment - WiFi, flat-screen TV with premium channels
Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker, minibar, and 24-hour room service
Sleep - Pillowtop bed, premium bedding, a down duvet, blackout drapes/curtains, and turndown service
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, and rainfall showerhead
Practical - Laptop-compatible safe, free newspaper, and iron/ironing board; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request
Comfort - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Non-Smoking
